title: GET_WEAPON_COMPONENT_RANGE_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
content:
0xE134FB8D// GetWeaponComponentRangeDamageModifier
float GET_WEAPON_COMPONENT_RANGE_DAMAGE_MODIFIER(Hash componentHash);Parameters:componentHash: Weapon component name hash.Returns: A weapon component damage modifier.A getter for CWeaponFallOffModifier damage modifier value in a weapon component.
